apps.localizedDescription:
Bisq Connect is a utility app designed to help users establish a secure connection to a trusted Bisq Node via WebSocket.

Key Features:

• Secure Node Access – Connect to a self-hosted Bisq Node over WebSocket for remote interaction.
• Server-Controlled Configuration – Just enter the pairing code from your trusted node admin (or scan QR).
• Privacy-First Design – No data tracking, storage, or third-party interference—your connection stays private.
• Optimized for iOS – Lightweight and efficient, built for smooth performance on iPhone.
• Tor Support – Built-in Tor integration for enhanced privacy.

Bisq Connect empowers users with a simple and private way to access their trusted Bisq Node remotely.

## What's New

• First EU release via alternative distribution

• Enhanced UI/UX

## Requirements

• iOS 16.0 or later
• A running Bisq node to connect to
